text: KPresenter is a free presentation program that is part of KOffice, an office suite for the KDE Desktop Environment. KPresenter's native format is XML, compressed with ZIP. KPresenter is also able to load presentations from Microsoft PowerPoint, MagicPoint and OpenOffice.org Impress documents.Status of Supported File Formats . title: KPresenter
